summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of the Inventor Gender Checker app. All core functionality working correctly including OpenAI GPT-5.2 integration, MongoDB persistence, and Neo-Brutalist UI design.

design_issues.issue: Custom fonts (Syne, Outfit) may not be fully loaded on initial page load
design_issues.impact: Fonts fallback to system fonts initially but correct fonts are applied

passed_tests: All backend API endpoints (/api/, /api/analyze, /api/stats, /api/queries, /api/categories) working correctly
OpenAI GPT-5.2 integration via emergentintegrations working properly
Search input field accepts text and submits correctly
Results display properly with creator name, gender, category, and explanation
Scoreboard updates after each query showing accurate counts and percentages
Categories section displays with visual bars and proper breakdown
Recent queries section displays latest searches correctly
Data persists in MongoDB across multiple queries
Neo-Brutalist design implemented with bold colors, sharp edges, proper fonts
CountUp animations working on scoreboard numbers
Flash animation appears on result reveal
Input validation working (empty input shows error message)
Multiple invention testing successful (iPhone, Radium, DNA Structure, etc.)
Color scheme and visual design elements properly implemented
Button interactions and hover states working
